title: Labeladono
author: Labeladono
content: Hello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMI recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.You'll only have trouble if you don't understand Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in the first place. Because in the end, Bitcointalk is almost just like any other Bitcoin/cryptocurrency community.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.If you read all this and apply this information in practice, then in a year you will be an experienced user of cryptocurrencies:Beginners & Help Encyclopediahttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5364418.0[HUGE LIST] Useful Crypto Links !!!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5264359If you are interested in community members, then read this interview:[Interviews] with Bitcointalk membershttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5262967

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Welcome on board, few suggestions :Read more post less for atleast a month, If you couldn't find what you are looking for on google or the forum search bar, go to this board and read this topic try to spend a few hours there, eventually you will learn whatever is needed for newbies.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMAs they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Not everybody can teach you what you want to learn. The bigger part of the learning lies with you. You have to make out time to read and make more research to develop yourself. Without that you will be constantly waiting for people to always direct your every time decision. Take up yourself and decide your faith. And anyone telling you to chat them up on any other platform is not to be trusted. Beware of them because they will want to take advantage of you.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: We are here in Bitcointalk forum which many people are having discussions with different topics and there are different boards for each kind of topics like this one. Even if you don't ask for guidance from someone here in Bitcointalk yet you could still learn through reading different threads and maybe do it yourself if there is a guide that you can follow. We are all just like yoi starting from the bottom until you achieve what we have right now and also earn a little bit of crypto at the same time.

comments.author: Sanitough
comments.created_time: December 28, 2022, 09:58:15 PMLast edit: December 28, 2022, 10:10:22 PM by Sanitough
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on December 28, 2022, 07:54:21 PMQuote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMI recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.You'll only have trouble if you don't understand Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in the first place. Because in the end, Bitcointalk is almost just like any other Bitcoin/cryptocurrency community. The reason why there is a need to do a lot of research first before you can finally understand bitcoin and this bitcointalk forum. And for you to be able to do that, you have to widely open your mind not only in the forum but also to the different ideas coming from different resources. And prepare yourself for a good discussion, as bitcointalk forum is not only a place to learn, but you should also be a source of good and quality information so that others will also learn from you. In short, this forum will enable everyone to learn and benefit from all members.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own. You are in the right tract. The people in the forum will always be happy to extend their knowledge and understanding on the different topics concerning bitcoin and cryptocurrency. But you also have to do your part. Do a lot of reading and make a good research too not only in the forum itself but even to some other resources that will give you ideas about cryptocurrency. After all, cryptocurrency is not new at all, everything are spread all over the internet but always look for legit information from viable resources.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.For better learnings always read the pinned post on every section since this could help you learn something which you can get a basis on everything you want to ask and since you are here first thing you can start to read up is the sticky post on the beginners section to know what things you need to do and what are those things you can avoid. Also there's a search bar on top which you can also use to search some information discuss by fellow forum users and its very helpful to read there opinion regarding on what they are discussing. Hopefully all of the information in this forum can help you.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: I used this Newbie kit that works for you too.‚ñ∂Ô∏è Forum's ‚≠êRules, ‚≠êranks, positions, badges, ‚≠êeverything about ranks, activity, merit‚ñ∂Ô∏è Read before posting‚ñ∂Ô∏è [General] Bitcoin Wallets - Which, what, why?‚ñ∂Ô∏è 5 Resources to teach Average Joe about Bitcoin‚ñ∂Ô∏è [GUIDE] How to Create a Strong/Secure Password‚ñ∂Ô∏è [GUIDE] How to Safely Download and Verify Electrumüî• Welcome

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.Hello and welcome to the community! ¬†It is always exciting to meet new people and engage in meaningful conversations, so do not be afraid to jump right in and get involved.Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMAs they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Bitcointalk.org is an online forum where people who are interested in Bitcoin can share their thoughts on the cryptocurrency and it is a great resource for learning. When you join the community as a new member, you can learn from more experienced members and share your own insights to the community. With so many different threads, there are plenty of discussions to be had and you can easily find one that interests you. The more you participate, the more you will get out of the experience. Good luck!

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Well starting reading and learning are the first steps that I can suggest.Spend your precious time reading here in Bitcointalk and you will find out your answer in the next month after reading. Because everything will get hard if you don't understand the basic information that bitcoin has and the technology behind it. Pinned post topics that you can find in this section will really help you, I will not post here the link because it is already pinned topics. I think most of us here no one has educated ourselves except, for your own research.Just read the above links dropped it certainly gives and insight into bitcoin and how it will use.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: All it takes is for you to spend as much time as possible here on the forum. Over time, you will find what suits your inclinations and knowledge, because the forum contains various sections. It would be good if you did not forget to review the forum rules and the various systems (trust,merit..) that regulate various activities here.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Well the beauty of this community is that everything is almost here, you used the search button if you are looking for something before you can ask questions here.Start with a baby steps and for sure as you go along you will understand crypto and everything behind, from wallet, it's different kind to blockchain and trading. And so with that, you need to spend more time here, just go around the forum and explore and you will be good. You don't have to rush it, just take your time and educated yourself.Best of luck in your crypto journey.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Welcome to forum. All I can say is just hang around and be active here. Theres a lot to learn and grasp here. Maybe youll find it difficult at first but dont worry, everyone started as a newbie and asking question here could boost your knowledge. Also try to read important links send here on this thread and also other useful one. If not yet affiliated or familiar with bitcoin, there are plenty of reference here to read. But the best one is read Satoshi's Bitcoin Whitepaper.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Sanitough on December 28, 2022, 09:58:15 PMThe reason why there is a need to do a lot of research first before you can finally understand bitcoin and this bitcointalk forum. And for you to be able to do that, you have to widely open your mind not only in the forum but also to the different ideas coming from different resources. And prepare yourself for a good discussion, as bitcointalk forum is not only a place to learn, but you should also be a source of good and quality information so that others will also learn from you. In short, this forum will enable everyone to learn and benefit from all members.You're pretty much describing most bitcoin/cryptocurrency communities though. What you describe doesn't solely relate to Bitcointalk ‚Äî but to other communities such as Reddit and Twitter as well.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMnow I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Firstly welcome to the forum, you're in the right place, consider every criticize that come later as a means of educating you. In addition to all the above users have highlighted, I'll like to encourage you to participate more in your local baord and when you're well founded with the forum you can come back to the main board. Avoid plagiarism if you want your stay here to be long and also learn to go straight to your point.You spoke about things you can't achieve on your own and didn't mention them, it'll make more sense if you had mention them so people here can help you with resources that'll help you understand those things. We have so many well equipped members here that can help you with whatever you need irrespective of what areas they're based in.Once again welcome to the forum, keep your head down and be really interesting in learning and not be camouflaging to gain the love of the community since people here are always interested in people's that wants to learn. Goodluck on your stay.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 28, 2022, 07:19:46 PMHello there?As a brand-new member of this community, I am really happy to have found it and eager to meet new individuals who can inform me about Bitcointalk.org.As they say, "a single drop of water cannot make an ocean," I am eager to learn from anybody who is willing to help a brother and expose me to this platform. I recently joined Bitcointalk.org and now I realize there are many things to comprehend on this topic that I can't achieve on my own.Good start, OP. Despite the fact that the new year has not yet begun, you can set a goal for yourself for 2023 to learn Bitcoin. I like that you are open to communication; this forum contains a lot of information, and there are also a lot of interesting participants.But based on your statement about one drop, do not forget that one drop is also enough to overflow the cup. Therefore, please do not try to deceive the forum or copy someone else's content here. Be natural, and you will be amazed at how soon you will change your outlook on life.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! You indicated you‚Äôre willing to get educated on here hopefully about bitcoin more than all other alt coins out there. You‚Äôve arrived at the right place for this forum would give an answer to any of your questions so ask away‚Ä¶ I would suggest you take your time to familiarize yourself with the forum, the boards and sub boards. You will see there is a whole lot to read. For your stay on here to be uneventful, you must know there are various things members generally frown at and oppose. These things add up to form an unofficial rule that‚Äôs regulating the forum and keeping things sane and in check. These are the unofficial rules of the forum. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0¬† I would suggest you take your time and read through the threads already posted. You would most likely find answers to most if not all of your questions you may have in mind. If you‚Äôre really willing to get educated on here, then premium education you would get I assure you.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: Welcome,take your time to read the bitcointalk forum rules and regulations.Avoid ans ignore users entering your PM telling you about scam projects, be your natural self.Development of a thick skin is good, you're to see all sort of habits here it is best fir you to ignore than to show you feel.I hope you enjoy your time learning about Bitcoin
